body:
So, just to clear things up. You can only be hacked (Your Minecraft) ONLY if you do the following.
1. Click the link a staff member has given you via Skype.
2. Proceed to login with your Minecraft details. 
That's how you get hacked, if you didn't do those actions, you're safe.
Thanks for reading hope this post helped,
